title: Does anybody know what this font is?
content:
Does anybody know what this font is?

Thanks  
-Dave

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012151757im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/sample_5192.jpg)

 [‹ B&W typeface ID please](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012151757/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50359 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Droog Event 2: Urban Play" squarish slab serif - Morgan Avec {Akira} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012151757/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50289 "Go to next forum topic")
author: popinfresh

comments.content:
Hi Dave,  
that’s Colossalis by [Aldo Novarese](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012151757/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Aldo%252BNovarese).  
F
